N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 113.10 - Time and contents of answer

State Regulations
(a) The respondent must serve and file his
answer to a statement of appeal not later than 10 days after the date of its
service upon him. If the statement of appeal was served by mail, the date of
mailing and the two days subsequent thereto shall be excluded in computing the
10-day period. (b) The answer shall
contain a clear and concise narrative statement of the reasons for the order
appealed from, including a statement of the authority for the order. The
respondent may attach to his answer such supporting affidavits, memoranda or
other papers as he considers pertinent to the appeal. Notes
